{{short description|Adûnaic word}}
'''Adûn''' is [[Adûnaic]] for ''west''.
==Etymology==
Derived from [[Sindarin]] ''[[dûn]]'' and ''[[annûn]]''
==Cognates==
*[[Quenya]] ''[[andúnë]]''
*[[Sindarin]] ''[[dûn]]'', ''[[annûn]]''
